faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions
faq.supportSLA: We respond to all messages within 24 business hours

general.q1: How do I enroll in a course?
general.a1: To enroll in a course, first create your account or log in. Then, navigate to the desired course page and click the 'Enroll' button. Some courses may be free, while others require payment.
general.q2: Can I access courses on mobile?
general.a2: Yes! Our platform is fully responsive and can be accessed from any device: computer, tablet, or smartphone. Study anywhere, anytime.
general.q3: How long do I have to finish a course?
general.a3: There is no time limit! Study at your own pace. Once enrolled, access is lifetime, letting you revisit content whenever needed.

certificates.q1: How do I get my certificate?
certificates.a1: After completing 100% of the course lessons, your certificate is generated automatically. You can access and download it on the 'My Certificates' page within your student area.
certificates.a2: Our certificates are digital and prove course completion on the platform. They can be used for complementary hours, resume enrichment, and professional development.
certificates.a3: Yes! The certificate is generated as a PDF, which can be easily printed or shared digitally.

payments.a1: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and PIX. Payments are processed securely through trusted platforms.
payments.a2: Yes! You have up to 7 days after purchase to request a full refund, according to consumer protection laws. After that period, we review specific cases.
payments.q3: Do courses have a monthly fee?
payments.a3: No! Courses are sold with a one-time payment. Once purchased, you have lifetime access to the content, including future updates.

instructors.q1: How does the instructor receive payments?
instructors.a1: The student pays the course price to the instructor. We apply a fee by plan: in the Free plan the payout is 85% (15% fee per sale), and in paid plans the payout is 100% with a monthly fee charged to the instructor.
instructors.q2: Is there a monthly fee for instructors?
instructors.a2: Yes, in paid plans we charge a monthly fee to unlock 0% fee per sale. In the Free plan there is no monthly fee, only the 15% fee per sale.
instructors.q3: Does the platform sell ad slots?
instructors.a3: We are preparing course catalog ad slots for featured instructors. Buying ads is optional and independent from fees or subscriptions.

support.q1: I'm having trouble accessing classes, what should I do?
support.a1: First, check your internet connection and try refreshing the page. If the issue persists, clear your browser cache or try another device. If you still have trouble, contact our support.
support.q2: I forgot my password, how do I recover it?
support.a2: On the login page, click 'Forgot my password'. Enter your registered email and you will receive a recovery code to create a new password.
support.a3: You can reach us via email at visiondevgrid@proton.me or through the messaging system inside the platform. Our team replies within 24 business hours.
